hooks.name: gk/gravityedit/user_registration/restored_user
hooks.description: Modify the user data after updated by Gravity Forms User Registration but before restored by GravityView

parameters.name: restored_user
parameters.description: The user with restored details about to be updated by wp_update_user()

parameters.name: user_before_update
parameters.description: The user before being updated by Gravity Forms User Registration

parameters.name: user_after_update
parameters.description: The user after being updated by Gravity Forms User Registration

parameters.name: entry
parameters.description: The Gravity Forms entry that was just updated

hooks.name: gk/gravityedit/user_registration/trigger_update

parameters.name: boolean
parameters.description: Whether to trigger update on user registration (default: true)

parameters.description: Gravity Forms field object. Is an instance of GF_Field.

hooks.name: gravityview-inline-edit/jquery-ui-theme
hooks.description: Filters the jquery ui theme value.

parameters.name: jquery_ui_theme
parameters.description: Name of jQuery UI theme to use. Default: "base"

hooks.name: gravityview-inline-edit/js-settings

parameters.name: container
parameters.description: When using popup $mode, jQuery selector used to attach the popup container [Default: "body"]

parameters.name: onblur
parameters.description: Action when user clicks outside the inline edit form container. Options are "cancel", "submit", "ignore". Setting ignore allows to have several containers open. [Default: "cancel"]

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Array with [form_id] key set for Form ID, or [view_id] key set for View ID currently being displayed

hooks.name: gravityview-inline-edit/poshytip-theme

parameters.name: poshytip_theme
parameters.description: Name of jQuery popup tooltip theme to use. Default: "yellowsimple"

hooks.name: gravityview-inline-edit/remove-gf-update-hooks
hooks.description: Filters during gravityview inline edit remove gf update hooks processing.

gravityview-inline-edit/toggle-labels
gravityview-inline-edit/user-can-edit-entry
